author: hqucms
body:
#### PR description:

Running the inner/outer convolution in batch for each tau candidate speeds up the overall DeepTau inference by ~20%.

Related issue: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/27119

#### PR validation:

Validated on a JetHT file with ~100k events and obtained consistent results on DeepTau outputs.
title: Speed up DeepTau by running the inner/outer convolution in batch
